fields.name: The Haunted Library
fields.description: Solve the mystery of the haunted books.

fields.name: Space Station Alpha
fields.description: Escape before the oxygen runs out.

fields.name: The Pharaoh's Tomb
fields.description: Uncover the secrets of the ancient tomb before time runs out.

fields.name: Cyber Heist
fields.description: Hack into the mainframe and escape undetected.

fields.name: The Enchanted Forest
fields.description: Find your way out of the magical forest by solving fairy riddles.

fields.name: Ghostly Riddles
fields.description: Solve the riddles to appease the spirits.

fields.name: Flickering Lights
fields.description: The lights flicker as you enter. What do you do to see better?

fields.name: Whispering Shelves
fields.description: A whisper tells you to find the oldest book. What year do you look for?

fields.name: Locked Drawer
fields.description: A drawer is locked with a riddle: 'I have keys but open no locks.'

fields.name: Ghostly Footsteps
fields.description: You hear footsteps behind you. What do you say to calm the ghost?

fields.name: Secret Passage
fields.description: A book triggers a secret door. Which book do you pull?

fields.name: Haunted Portrait
fields.description: A portrait's eyes follow you. What is the subject's name?

fields.name: Ancient Tome
fields.description: A tome is written in code. What is the first word?

fields.name: Creaky Floorboard
fields.description: A floorboard creaks in a pattern. What number does it tap out?

fields.name: Final Lock
fields.description: The final lock asks: 'What is the librarian's secret?'

fields.name: Oxygen Countdown
fields.description: Restore the oxygen supply before time runs out.

fields.name: Zero Gravity
fields.description: How do you anchor yourself in zero gravity?

fields.name: Control Panel
fields.description: Which button restarts the life support?

fields.name: Alien Message
fields.description: Decode the alien message: '01000001' (ASCII)?

fields.name: Airlock Sequence
fields.description: What is the correct sequence to open the airlock?

fields.name: Power Outage
fields.description: Which backup system restores power?

fields.name: Navigation Error
fields.description: What is the correct course to Earth?

fields.name: Robot Helper
fields.description: What is the robot's activation code?

fields.name: Hull Breach
fields.description: What material patches the breach?

fields.name: Escape Pod
fields.description: What code launches the escape pod?

fields.name: Pharaoh's Code
fields.description: Crack the ancient code to unlock the tomb.

fields.name: Hieroglyphics
fields.description: Translate the symbol for 'life'.

fields.name: Sarcophagus Lock
fields.description: What animal guards the pharaoh?

fields.name: Golden Scarab
fields.description: Which color is the sacred scarab?

fields.name: River Nile
fields.description: What direction does the Nile flow?

fields.name: Sun Dial
fields.description: What time is it when the shadow points east?

fields.name: Cursed Chamber
fields.description: What word breaks the curse?

fields.name: Anubis Statue
fields.description: What offering does Anubis accept?

fields.name: Secret Passage
fields.description: Which stone opens the passage?

fields.name: Final Riddle
fields.description: What is the pharaoh's true name?

fields.name: Firewall Breach
fields.description: What tool bypasses the firewall?

fields.name: Encrypted File
fields.description: What is the password hint: 'First pet'?

fields.name: Security Camera
fields.description: Which wire disables the camera?

fields.name: Mainframe Access
fields.description: What is the admin username?

fields.name: Data Vault
fields.description: What is the vault's unlock code?

fields.name: Laser Grid
fields.description: How do you bypass the laser grid?

fields.name: Biometric Lock
fields.description: Whose fingerprint opens the door?

fields.name: Alarm Override
fields.description: What code silences the alarm?

fields.name: Escape Route
fields.description: Which exit is unguarded?

fields.name: Final Upload
fields.description: What is the file name to upload?

fields.name: Fairy Lights
fields.description: What color do the fairy lights turn at midnight?

fields.name: Talking Tree
fields.description: What is the tree's favorite word?

fields.name: Magic Stream
fields.description: What animal drinks from the stream at dawn?

fields.name: Hidden Path
fields.description: What flower marks the hidden path?

fields.name: Mushroom Circle
fields.description: How many mushrooms in the fairy ring?

fields.name: Enchanted Mirror
fields.description: What word unlocks the mirror's secret?

fields.name: Pixie Dust
fields.description: What ingredient activates pixie dust?

fields.name: Wise Owl
fields.description: What is the owl's answer to every riddle?

fields.name: Moonlit Clearing
fields.description: What appears in the clearing at midnight?

fields.name: Forest Gate
fields.description: What is the password to leave the forest?
